headline.main: Police Shoot to Death California Man Who Stabbed Six People
headline.print_headline: Police Shoot to Death California Man Who Stabbed Six People

docs.snippet: A 28-year-old man armed with a large knife wounded six people, including three employees at a convalescent home, when he went on a stabbing spree in Long Beach, California, before police shot him to death, officials said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 28-year-old man armed with a large knife wounded six people, including three employees at a convalescent home, when he went on a stabbing spree in Long Beach, California, before police shot him to death, officials said on Saturday.

headline.main: Marquez Claims Another Pole Position at Indy
headline.print_headline: Marquez Claims Another Pole Position at Indy

docs.snippet: Marc Marquez once again found his groove at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway as the reigning MotoGP champion from Spain won his third consecutive pole at the Brickyard on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Marc Marquez once again found his groove at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway as the reigning MotoGP champion from Spain won his third consecutive pole at the Brickyard on Saturday.

headline.main: Joey Logano Wins Xfinity Race at Watkins Glen
headline.print_headline: Joey Logano Wins Xfinity Race at Watkins Glen

docs.snippet: When it comes to the Xfinity Series race at Watkins Glen International, it's become Penske Racing's playground now that Marcos Ambrose is no longer around....
docs.lead_paragraph: When it comes to the Xfinity Series race at Watkins Glen International, it's become Penske Racing's playground now that Marcos Ambrose is no longer around.

headline.main: Serbia Sink Croatia to Take World Water Polo Title
headline.print_headline: Serbia Sink Croatia to Take World Water Polo Title

docs.snippet: Serbia won their second world water polo championship as an independent nation in an 11-4 rout of traditional rivals Croatia in the final on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Serbia won their second world water polo championship as an independent nation in an 11-4 rout of traditional rivals Croatia in the final on Saturday.

headline.main: Man Found Dead in Yellowstone Attacked by Grizzly Bear
headline.print_headline: Man Found Dead in Yellowstone Attacked by Grizzly Bear

docs.lead_paragraph: The National Park Service says a Montana man found dead in Yellowstone National Park was the victim of a grizzly bear attack.

headline.main: Did Roger Stone Jump, or Was He Pushed From Donald Trump’s Campaign?

docs.snippet: Both Donald Trump and political strategist Roger Stone agree they have parted ways. What they don’t agree on is when and how they did it....
docs.abstract: Both Donald Trump and political strategist Roger Stone agree they have parted ways. What they don’t agree on is when and how they did it.

headline.main: Jimenez Shoots 61, Ties Montgomerie for Calgary Lead
headline.print_headline: Jimenez Shoots 61, Ties Montgomerie for Calgary Lead

docs.snippet: Miguel Angel Jimenez eagled the par-5 18th hole Saturday to match the course record of 9-under 61 and tie Colin Montgomerie for the second-round lead in the Shaw Charity Classic....
docs.lead_paragraph: Miguel Angel Jimenez eagled the par-5 18th hole Saturday to match the course record of 9-under 61 and tie Colin Montgomerie for the second-round lead in the Shaw Charity Classic.

headline.main: Frances Kelsey, Doctor Who Opposed Thalidomide, Dies at 101
headline.print_headline: Frances Kelsey, Doctor Who Opposed Thalidomide, Dies at 101

docs.snippet: Frances Kelsey, a Canadian doctor known for her tenacity in keeping a dangerous drug given to pregnant women off the U.S. market, has died at age 101....
docs.lead_paragraph: Frances Kelsey, a Canadian doctor known for her tenacity in keeping a dangerous drug given to pregnant women off the U.S. market, has died at age 101.

headline.main: Mourinho More Annoyed With Chelsea Medics Than Players
headline.print_headline: Mourinho More Annoyed With Chelsea Medics Than Players

docs.snippet: Chelsea's Jose Mourinho, who hoped to celebrate his new contract with victory at an expectant Stamford Bridge, ended up grateful his team did not become the first Premier League champions to start their title defence with a defeat....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chelsea's Jose Mourinho, who hoped to celebrate his new contract with victory at an expectant Stamford Bridge, ended up grateful his team did not become the first Premier League champions to start their title defence with a defeat.
